channel.title: [637/639] DecimationScape RSPS - Summoning / Godwars / Nex / Dungeoneering +MORE
channel.description:
Hello everyone I am Justin, and I have been working on DecimationScape RSPS for a while now on and off, here is some of my progress so far.
Commands List [code]home empty mypoints players skill skills train ancients modern lunar nex godwars dung bandoslair zammylair saralair armalair tzhaar td summoning edge crystalmines mindaltar airaltar earthaltar firealtar bodyaltar lawaltar chaosaltar deathaltar bloodaltar abyss naturealtar shops metaldrags curses canifis slayertower stf2 stf3 mithdrags corp kbd drags drags2 mb magebank edgepk cmds cmdlist commands nomad skull dks dags tds strykewyrms bosskills [/code] There are a few more commands that are a work in progress, list will be updated later.
[center]Features Include:[/center] [center]Challenging & Fun Custom Bosses, Including:[/center] [center]Nex[/center] [center]Nomad[/center] [center]100% Godwars Bosses[/center] [center]Corp[/center] [center]KBD[/center] [center]Dagganoth Kings[/center] [center]Tormented Demons[/center] [center]Jad[/center] [center]And More![/center]
[center]ALL 24 SKILLS WORK![/center] [center]Stable Economy![/center] [center]All Nex Gear[/center] [center]Dungeoneering Gear (Rare drops)[/center] [center]CUSTOM DUNGEONEERING [/center] [center]SUMMONING![/center] [center]Perfect PvP System / Trade in PK points at shop for rewards![/center] [center]100% Working Spirit Shields![/center] [center]Overload Potions[/center] [center]Special Restore Potions[/center] [center]Super Prayer Potions[/center] [center]Imbued Rings![/center] [center]Korasi![/center] [center]PvP Gear[/center] [center]Several Whip/Dark Bow versions ( each with diff stats )[/center] [center]3rd Age Gear[/center] And more to come soon!
[center][size=24pt][b]MEDIA[/size][/center] Home Area [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/dheadi.png[/img]
Random Shops [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/1l0s5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2aj54iq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2rr4g3n.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/wjjtp3.png[/img]
skill cape shop [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/mkiql4.png[/img]
Dungeoneering Shop (85% Complete) [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/sbmviv.png[/img]
Slayer Task has Low/Med/High Difficulty! [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/wv8tuw.png[/img]
PvP Shop! - Trade in Pk Points for tokens to buy items! [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2exohmf.png[/img]
Custom Dungeoneering - Low Level Area [MEDIA COMING SOON]
Custom Dungeoneering - Med Level Area [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/fd4wew.png[/img]
Custom Dungeoneering - High Level Area [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2daznyw.png[/img]
Custom Dungeoneering Bosses!!! [Over 10 / Will post pics of others later] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2gw96dj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ynj70z.png[/img]
Godwars Dungeon Bosses! All 100% Coded
Bandos [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/33459v6.png[/img]
Armadyl [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/fut4x5.png[/img]
Zamorak Boss [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/n5oje8.png[/img]
Saradomin Boss [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/xgl9nq.png[/img]
Corp Beast!! Drops Elixir / Sigil / Spirit Shields / More! [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2le1cfc.png[/img]
Custom Nex Combat! [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/20p7rrq.png[/img]
KBD [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/96z413.png[/img]
Tormented Demons [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ivz96o.png[/img]
Custom Nomad Boss [Drops Rare Items] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/osbnn5.png[/img]
Dagganoth Kings! [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/124ygpu.png[/img]
Frost Dragons!! [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/23k98oh.png[/img]
Working Summoning Combat!! [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/lbnlu.png[/img]
Pack Yak BoB Works - Pack Yak Winter Storage Special also works! [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/oa2hom.png[/img]
Perfect PvP System [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2uem9tu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2cpywls.png[/img]
To do list: Complete dung bosses [7/10 fully coded] Complete coding for ring of vigour Finish adding drops for slayer monsters (67% Done) Finish adding drops to dungeoneering bosses (40% done) Finish Coding new custom barrows minigame (55% Done) Fix a few small errors I have.
Feel free to leave any feedback!
Credit: I started with a blank base and have coded a lot of this myself, but I have had help from ALOT of people. I would like to thank the following for all the help. Wildking72 Dementhium Development Team Emperor Mysticflow Wolfey Rune-Server Community And the mopar-scape community Thank you all for the assistance in developing this!
This server has been a work in progress for a long time, and I am glad to announce it will be released very soon! I shall keep you all updated on updates!
[center][size=36pt][color=red]COMING January 15, 2014[/size][/center]

item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

Hello everyone I am Justin, and I have been working on DecimationScape RSPS for a while now on and off, here is some of my progress so far.

Commands List

home empty mypoints players skill skills train ancients modern lunar nex godwars dung bandoslair zammylair saralair armalair tzhaar td summoning edge crystalmines mindaltar airaltar earthaltar firealtar bodyaltar lawaltar chaosaltar deathaltar bloodaltar abyss naturealtar shops metaldrags curses canifis slayertower stf2 stf3 mithdrags corp kbd drags drags2 mb magebank edgepk cmds cmdlist commands nomad skull dks dags tds strykewyrms bosskills
There are a few more commands that are a work in progress, list will be updated later.

[center]Features Include:[/center]
[center]Challenging & Fun Custom Bosses, Including:[/center]
[center]Nex[/center]
[center]Nomad[/center]
[center]100% Godwars Bosses[/center]
[center]Corp[/center]
[center]KBD[/center]
[center]Dagganoth Kings[/center]
[center]Tormented Demons[/center]
[center]Jad[/center]
[center]And More![/center]

[center]ALL 24 SKILLS WORK![/center]
[center]Stable Economy![/center]
[center]All Nex Gear[/center]
[center]Dungeoneering Gear (Rare drops)[/center]
[center]CUSTOM DUNGEONEERING [/center]
[center]SUMMONING![/center]
[center]Perfect PvP System / Trade in PK points at shop for rewards![/center]
[center]100% Working Spirit Shields![/center]
[center]Overload Potions[/center]
[center]Special Restore Potions[/center]
[center]Super Prayer Potions[/center]
[center]Imbued Rings![/center]
[center]Korasi![/center]
[center]PvP Gear[/center]
[center]Several Whip/Dark Bow versions ( each with diff stats )[/center]
[center]3rd Age Gear[/center]
And more to come soon!

[center][size=24pt][b]MEDIA[/size][/center]
Home Area

Random Shops



skill cape shop

Dungeoneering Shop (85% Complete)

Slayer Task has Low/Med/High Difficulty!

PvP Shop! - Trade in Pk Points for tokens to buy items!

Custom Dungeoneering - Low Level Area
[MEDIA COMING SOON]

Custom Dungeoneering - Med Level Area

Pack Yak BoB Works - Pack Yak Winter Storage Special also works!

Perfect PvP System

To do list:
Complete dung bosses [7/10 fully coded]
Complete coding for ring of vigour
Finish adding drops for slayer monsters (67% Done)
Finish adding drops to dungeoneering bosses (40% done)
Finish Coding new custom barrows minigame (55% Done)
Fix a few small errors I have.

Feel free to leave any feedback!

Credit:
I started with a blank base and have coded a lot of this myself, but I have had help from ALOT of people. I would like to thank the following for all the help.
Wildking72
Dementhium Development Team
Emperor
Mysticflow
Wolfey
Rune-Server Community
And the mopar-scape community
Thank you all for the assistance in developing this!

This server has been a work in progress for a long time, and I am glad to announce it will be released very soon!
I shall keep you all updated on updates!

[center][size=36pt][color=red]COMING January 15, 2014[/size][/center]
